metadata.Title: CVE-2021-21147 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Inappropriate implementation in Skia in Google Chrome prior to88.0.4324.146 allowed a local attacker to spoof the contents of the Omnibox(URL bar) via a crafted HTML page.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-21147` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

chromium-browser - 89.0.4389.82-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-browser-l10n - 89.0.4389.82-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-chromedriver - 89.0.4389.82-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg - 89.0.4389.82-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg-extra - 89.0.4389.82-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: chromium-browser package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '89.0.4389.82-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
